feed.title: BIP for standard multi-signature P2SH addresses

entry.title: BIP for standard multi-signature P2SH addresses
entry.summary: Bitcoinj is a Java implementation of the Bitcoin protocol. It uses a convention where units of Bitcoin are represented in code as "satoshi", named after the pseudonymous creator of Bitcoin, Satoshi Nakamoto. This convention is also used by other Bitcoin implementations, including Bitcoin Core.
